alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:10AM MST until January 07 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Grand Canyon, North Rim and Valle. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to noon Sunday: Grand Canyon 4 to 6 inches North Rim 5 to 9 inches Valle 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
